nodes.bodyText: What's the rationale for using exactly 2mm? Why not 1mm for example?

It seems to match the official screenshots https://android.quran.com/images/scr_2.png .
Smaller wouldn't achieve the desired effect (i.e let the brain know which side you're on).
To answer @ahmedre 's question I wasn't aware that dp was a resolution independent size so can replace mm with the equivalent dp if that's preferred/more efficient.
